title: Beware! Sectarian assassinations are directed at you!!! (Irish Republican poster, ca. 1974)
Text: Beware! Sectarian assassinations are directed at you!!! Don’t answer calls at home unless you can identifythe caller. Don’t accept lifts from strangers. Be vigilant at all times whether at work, at home or at leisure. THESE SECTARIAN ASSASSINS WILL KILL YOU DON’T HELP THEM.
